attributes.action: Build a proper (larger) nursery in Callander.
attributes.additional_details: My daughter is due to start nursery in January 2017 after turning 3 in November 2016 and we have been told that she will be only getting 3 afternoons instead of 5 afternoon due to lack of space.
attributes.background: This petition is about getting a proper nursery built in Callander to give parents childcare options and to give children 5 days a week education. Due to our portable classroom Hut we have as a nursery just now there is not enough space for kids to even have 5 afternoon sessions.

rejection.details: You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
